q1: What type of encryption is used?
a1: The tool uses standard PDF encryption with user and owner passwords. The user password is required to open the file, while the owner password controls editing permissions.
q2: Can I control what users can do?
a2: Yes! You can allow or restrict printing, copying text, and modifying the document. Set these permissions before protecting your PDF.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your PDF and passwords never leave your device â€” nothing is sent to any server.
